type.name: org.gradle.play.tasks.RoutesCompile
type.description:
Task for compiling routes templates into Scala code.

This task is usually created as one of the build tasks when building a Play application with the org.gradle.play.plugins.PlayPlugin plugin. Explicit configuration of this task is not expected and should be performed on the equivalent settings at the org.gradle.play.PlayApplicationSpec level.

method.name: getAdditionalImports
method.description:
Returns the additional imports of the Play Routes compiler.

returns:The additional imports.

method.name: getForkOptions
method.description:
The fork options to be applied to the Routes compiler.

returns:The fork options for the Routes compiler.

method.name: getInjectedRoutesGenerator
method.description:
Is the injected routes generator (play.routes.compiler.InjectedRoutesGenerator) used for generating routes? Default is false.

returns:false if StaticRoutesGenerator will be used to generate routes, true if InjectedRoutesGenerator will be used to generate routes.

method.name: getOutputDirectory
method.description:
Returns the directory to generate the parser source files into.

returns:The output directory.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description:
Returns the tool chain that will be used to compile the routes source.

returns:The tool chain.

method.name: isGenerateReverseRoutes
method.description: Whether a reverse router should be generated. Default is true.

method.name: isNamespaceReverseRouter
method.description: Whether the reverse router should be namespaced.

method.name: setAdditionalImports
method.description: Specifies the additional imports of the Play Routes compiler.

method.name: setGenerateReverseRoutes
method.description: Sets whether or not a reverse router should be generated.

method.name: setInjectedRoutesGenerator
method.description:
Configure if the injected routes generator should be used to generate routes.
param:injectedRoutesGenerator false - use StaticRoutesGenerator true - use InjectedRoutesGenerator

method.name: setNamespaceReverseRouter
method.description: Sets whether or not the reverse router should be namespaced.

method.name: setOutputDirectory
method.description:
Specifies the directory to generate the parser source files into.
param:outputDirectory The output directory. Must not be null.

property.name: additionalImports
property.description:
Returns the additional imports of the Play Routes compiler.

returns:The additional imports.

property.name: forkOptions
property.description:
The fork options to be applied to the Routes compiler.

returns:The fork options for the Routes compiler.

property.name: generateReverseRoutes
property.description: Whether a reverse router should be generated. Default is true.

property.name: injectedRoutesGenerator
property.description:
Is the injected routes generator (play.routes.compiler.InjectedRoutesGenerator) used for generating routes? Default is false.

returns:false if StaticRoutesGenerator will be used to generate routes, true if InjectedRoutesGenerator will be used to generate routes.

property.name: namespaceReverseRouter
property.description: Whether the reverse router should be namespaced.

property.name: outputDirectory
property.description:
Returns the directory to generate the parser source files into.

returns:The output directory.

property.name: toolChain
property.description:
Returns the tool chain that will be used to compile the routes source.

returns:The tool chain.
